room_title: Escape room "Haunted!" by Xscape Factor in Fayetteville

The room was very well put together and creative and it was challenging but not impossible or having to over think! Canâ€™t wait to try out more!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted!" by Xscape Factor in Fayetteville
review: My first time here and it was great. The last will and testament was pretty cool. The workers here are awesome and very friendly.

room_title: Escape room "Haunted!" by Xscape Factor in Fayetteville
review: My son and I had a great time solving The Last Will and Testament yesterday! We were looking for something new and fun to do yesterday, and Xscape Factor was the perfect activity!!
